textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   But as you said, better than nothing. As I recall with the D300 - that had the true trap focus - it stopped firing when you lost focus. ...when you choose continuous drive it starts to fire when you get into focus, as it should, but then it just keeps firing even if you lose focus again.
